subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kendry Morales broke a tie with a two-run homer in the eighth off Joba Chamberlain, and the Angels handed the Yankees their first two-game losing streak of the season.
snippet: Kendry Morales broke a tie with a two-run homer in the eighth off Joba Chamberlain, and the Angels handed the Yankees their first two-game losing streak of the season.
